content:
Dear Test User, Welcome to COMNIBUS, a humble book website made by readers for readers.
You can now access some of the features we have to offer such as: 
1. Write book reviews 
2. Catalogue the books you are reading 
3. Follow your friends and like minded readers 
 These are but a few of the features with more on the way. 
Happy Browsing, 
The Team at COMNIBUS
